text: A Tale of Two Kitchens is a 2019 short documentary film directed by Trisha Ziff. The film explores how Mexico City restaurant owner Gabriela Cámara opens sister eatery Cala in San Francisco, with a similar menu and, most importantly, a similar employee culture. The documentary was released on Netflix on May 22, 2019. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:2019 documentary films Category:2019 films Category:2019 short films Category:Short documentary films Category:Netflix original documentary films
title: A Tale of Two Kitchens
